unnormalised: Heavy traffic expected on NH44 near Panipat due to farmer protests on 15/08/2024. Commuters are advised to take alternate routes, maybe NH1. Expect delays of 2-3 hrs.
normalised: Heavy traffic expected on N-H forty four near Panipat due to farmer protests on fifteenth august two thousand and twenty four. Commuters are advised to take alternate routes, maybe N-H one. Expect delays of two to three hours.

unnormalised: Road construction ongoing on the Mumbai-Pune Expressway, specifically near Lonavala. Expect lane closures & a slower commute. Officials suggest starting your journey before 6:00 AM or after 10:00 PM to avoid the worst congestion. Keep a buffer time of at least 1 hour.
normalised: Road construction ongoing on the Mumbai-Pune Expressway, specifically near Lonavala. Expect lane closures and a slower commute. Officials suggest starting your journey before six a.m. or after ten p.m. to avoid the worst congestion. Keep a buffer time of at least one hour.

unnormalised: Planning a road trip to Kerala? Be warned, the monsoon has caused landslides near Munnar. Road closures and diversions are in effect. Check with local authorities or the Kerala State Road Transport Corporation (KSRTC) before you go. Maybe postpone till after 30/09/2024.
normalised: Planning a road trip to Kerala? Be warned, the monsoon has caused landslides near Munnar. Road closures and diversions are in effect. Check with local authorities or the Kerala State Road Transport Corporation (K-S-R-T-C) before you go. Maybe postpone till after thirtieth september two thousand and twenty four.

unnormalised: Good news for travellers to Rajasthan! The Delhi-Jaipur Expressway is now fully operational, cutting travel time down to approx. 4 hrs. Toll charges are Rs. 560 for cars. Remember to carry your FASTag!
normalised: Good news for travellers to Rajasthan! The Delhi-Jaipur Expressway is now fully operational, cutting travel time down to approximately four hours. Toll charges are rupees five hundred and sixty for cars. Remember to carry your F-A-S-T-ag!

unnormalised: Thinking of driving from Guwahati to Shillong? The roads are pretty bad in certain stretches, especially after heavy rainfall. The journey might take longer than the usual 3 hrs. Ensure your vehicle is in good condition and maybe hire a local driver familiar with the terrain. Carry snacks and water as dhabas might be few and far between.
normalised: Thinking of driving from Guwahati to Shillong? The roads are pretty bad in certain stretches, especially after heavy rainfall. The journey might take longer than the usual three hours. Ensure your vehicle is in good condition and maybe hire a local driver familiar with the terrain. Carry snacks and water as dhabas might be few and far between.
